SQLFunctionSpec.Name: USR_UFN_CHECK_RECURRINGGIFT_ISHELD
SQLFunctionSpec.Description: Checks to see if the recurring gift is being held.
SQLFunctionSpec.Author: Memphis Sellers
SQLFunctionSpec.CreateFunctionSQL:
create function dbo.USR_UFN_CHECK_RECURRINGGIFT_ISHELD( @REVENUESPLITID uniqueidentifier ) returns bit with execute as caller as begin -- do work here and return a value declare @isHeld bit = 0; -- default to No if exists (select 1 from dbo.ATTRIBUTE58705B2A658B4396A8F1BBC9003B9DCA where (REVENUEID = (select REVENUEID from dbo.REVENUESPLIT where ID = @REVENUESPLITID) and ENDDATE is null and BOOLEANCODE = 1) ) set @isHeld = 1;
return @isHeld; end
